product_name: CatEye Rapid 1 TL-LD611 Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Illuminate your night rides with the CatEye Rapid 1 TL-LD611 Front Bike Light. Its LED bulbs and a rechargeable battery make it a trusty companion for years of cycling.
